_header: The higher men climbeth the sorer is the fall
_description: ‘The mene ys the beste’ — three quatrains (abab) with refrain, ‘The mene ys best as semeth me’ and burden: ‘In euery state in euery degre / The mene ys the beste as semeth me’ (repeated)

BLAdd5665.First Lines:
The hyere men clemmeth the sorere ys the falleBanckes that lawe
                    buthe sone ouerflowe…
BLAdd5665.Last Lines:
…Les in thy yee ther falle a chyppeThe mene ys best as semeth
                    me
BLAdd5665.Editions:
